item.title: High Win Rate Bitcoin Whale Bets $95 Million On BTC’s Price Moving Higher – The Trade is Already In The Green
item.description: A Bitcoin whale with a 95% win rate has opened a nearly $96 million leveraged long position.

item.title: ASTS Stock Eyes Third Straight Weekly Gain As ‘Golden Dome’ Defense Buzz Gains Ground
item.description: The stock surged nearly 6% in premarket trading on Friday and would be its third straight day of gains if it holds during market hours.

item.title: Nasdaq, S&P 500 Futures Edge Higher Ahead Of Long Weekend: Why NVDA, MU, NTLA, ASTS Are On Traders' Radar Today
item.description: Retail sentiment on Stocktwits remains bullish on the S&P 500, even as macro risks linger.

item.title: Springview Extends Rally For Second Session After Eye-Popping 674% One-Day Surge
item.description: Springview jumped 15% in Friday’s premarket session and was among the top trending tickers on Stocktwits.

item.title: Cathie Wood’s ARK Made Just One Buy Last Session — And It’s A Biotech Stock Up Nearly 30% YTD
item.description: ARK doubles down on a CRISPR bet as Intellia Therapeutics’ stock heads for its best week since October.
